amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to retire, divest or transfer C-23 aircraft assigned to the Army.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 65 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent the retirement, divestment, transfer, or preparation to do so of C23 aircraft used by the National Guard and to designate $34 million for the sustainment and operation of the C23 aircraft in a viable state.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A057) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 154 (Roll no. 406).
